statements: UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_data = '{"comment":"Great post!"}' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_time = '2022-11-30 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = 789
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_type = 'Like' WHERE user_id = 1234 AND interaction_data->'$.article_id' = 5678
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_data = JSON_SET(interaction_data,'$.updated_at',NOW()) WHERE user_id = 5678
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_type = 'Comment', interaction_data = JSON_SET(interaction_data,'$.comment','Great post!') WHERE user_id = 9876
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_preferences SET vr_experience_preference = 'immersive' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_details = '{"button":"submit"}' WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_timestamp = '2022-10-15 14:30:00', interaction_type = 'comment' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_preferences SET vr_experience_preference = '2D', vr_genre_preference = 'Horror' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_details = '{"rating": 5, "comment": "Great experience!"}' WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE experiences SET price = 49.99 WHERE experience_id = 3;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE interaction_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET age = age + 1 WHERE age < 30;
UPDATE experiences SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE experience_id IN (SELECT experience_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase');
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE interaction_type = 'view';
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = 'dark mode' WHERE user_id = 2 AND preference_category = 'theme';
UPDATE virtual_reality_content SET content_rating = 5 WHERE content_id = 10;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_details = 'Updated interaction details' WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'viewed'
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = 'new_value' WHERE user_id = 456 AND preference_category = 'category1'
UPDATE virtual_reality_content SET content_rating = 5 WHERE content_id = 789
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE experiences SET price = 50.00 WHERE experience_id = 2;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'completed' WHERE interaction_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET age = age + 1 WHERE username = 'Alice';
UPDATE experiences SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE duration > 2;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Completed' WHERE interaction_time < NOW();
